title: ISIS Militants Tap Into 'Certain Rage' In Young Men
teaser: It's been another bloody week in Iraq, where the Sunni insurgent group known as ISIS  consolidated its control in the north and west of the country. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with  Mideast correspondent Deborah Amos about the group's ultimate goals and its appeal.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
